waf_arn.description: ARN of WAF that you can hook into ALB

target_type.description: backend target type of service in kubernetes eg: instance/ip : default is ip

disable_facets_host_rules.description: Boolean flag to enable or disable facets host rules in alb, in order to incorporate more rules. Since there is a hard limit of 100 rules in alb: default is false

maintain_rule_order.description: Boolean flag to maintain the order of rules specified in json using priority numbers inside rules
